/usr/bin/cc    -g3 -std=gnu11   -O3 -funroll-loops -fno-strict-aliasing  -finline-functions  -fdebug-prefix-map=/home/aaa10078nj/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21=.    CMakeFiles/platform-failures.dir/platform-failures/platform-failures.c.o  -o platform-failures/platform-failures -rdynamic ../../lib/libsimgrid.so.3.21 -lm /usr/lib64/libboost_context-mt.so -lpthread -lrt /usr/lib64/libdl.so -lgfortran   -Wl,--as-needed -latomic -Wl,--no-as-needed -Wl,-rpath,/home/aaa10078nj/fpga_network/SimGrid-3.21/lib
